issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing pull 582 across all iOS devices, the iPhone 4s showed a gap at the control tab when the app loaded. This did not occur on any other device we tested (all of them in our inventory)including other iOS 5.0 devices.

Steps to repro:
1) Install KS 1.7.x built with SDK 1.7.4.v20111021181815+ (the next build should have the pull code)
2) Hold device in landscape
3) Launch KS

Result:
See screenshot. There is a gap at the top of the screen, between the nab and status bars.

Expected:
No gap
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Launching in landscape on iPhone 4s with iOS 5.0 results in gap at top of screen
fields.environment: Mac OS 10.7.2, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.6.201110202348, SDK 1.7.4 Plus pull 582 code. iPhone 4s (iOS 5.0)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
